comments.author: Dominique Pfister
comments.body: Added a new  configuration parameter to DerbyPersistenceManager named "shutdownOnClose"; when set to "true" (the default), the database will be closed on exit; set it to "false" to use with a database running standalone.

description: DerbyPersistenceManager always shuts down the database on exit, which makes it unusable for standalone databases.
summary: DerbyPersistenceManager only usable for embedded databases
